code: import React from'react';import'../AdminDashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatCard=_ref=>{let{title,value,subtitle,color='#1976d2',icon,trend}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-card-icon-bg",style:{color},children:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-card-icon",style:{backgroundColor:"".concat(color,"15")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color},children:icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"stat-card-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-card-value",children:typeof value==='number'&&title.toLowerCase().includes('revenue')?"$".concat(value.toFixed(2)):value}),subtitle&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card-subtitle",children:[trend!==undefined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"trend-indicator ".concat(trend>0?'trend-up':'trend-down'),children:[trend>0?'↑':'↓'," ",Math.abs(trend),"%"]}),subtitle]})]});};export default StatCard;
